person.content:

Paragraph: League duties restricted the Barbarians ' selectorial options but they still boast 13 internationals including England full-back Tim Stimpson and recalled wing Tony Underwood , plus All Black forwards Ian Jones and Norm Hewitt .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Barbarians (implied, as the subject of the sentence) |
| Tim Stimpson |
| Tony Underwood |
| Ian Jones |
| Norm Hewitt |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions several entities, but only "Tim Stimpson," "Tony Underwood," "Ian Jones," and "Norm Hewitt" are clearly identified as people. The "Barbarians" are implied as the subject of the sentence but not explicitly stated as a person.
